long_description: for that reason, we don't offer a standardized "package." our designers will work closely with you every step of the way to create your fantasy home and build it into reality. we know you've been dreaming about #vanlife, sweet summer road trips, life in the great wide open. we're here to turn those dreams into reality. bespoke builds starts at c$95,000. larger vehicles, custom design/layout, and bespoke services will add to the build time. we charge a shop rate of c$115 per/hr for any bespoke work. this includes specialist services such as lift kits/suspension upgrades. the vanovation team brings together an eclectic mix of characters. our head of design is an ex-industrial designer turned bus conversion specialist with a keen eye for innovative design and solutions. supply and install solar panels and solar charge controller + custom cabinetry. custom van and skoolie (school bus) conversions based in squamish, british columbia.
business_tags: electrical & plumbing | building repairs | spray foam insulation | materials & parts | roof vents | electrical systems | general contractor | industrial design | fridges | custom wood works | heavy machinery | milling works | window install | ford transit | custom interiors | vehicle customization | school bus | suspension upgrades | custom features | lift kits / suspensions
generated_description: vanovation custom conversions, legally known as vanovation custom conversions inc., is a van and skoolie (school bus) conversion company based in squamish, british columbia. the company specializes in converting school buses, sprinters, promasters, and transit vans, as well as offering partial and diy conversions. their services include spray foam insulation, window installation, solar integration, 12v/120v electrical systems, and plumbing. provides both full custom builds and partial conversions, ensuring high-quality craftsmanship and attention to detail.
